meanings.sent1: The tyros in the cooking class were learning how to chop vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The tyros in the art club were excited to start painting their first masterpiece.
meanings.sent3: The tyros in the dance group tripped over each other but laughed it off.
meanings.sent4: The tyros in the hiking club navigated the trails with wide eyes and eager hearts.
meanings.sent5: The tyros in the coding workshop were like sponges, soaking up every piece of information.

meanings.sent1: The tyros in the soccer team struggled to pass the ball accurately.
meanings.sent2: The tyros in the choir sang with enthusiasm but lacked harmony.
meanings.sent3: The tyros in the gardening club planted flowers upside down by mistake.
